mosinstall.description:
"AJAX HEADER ROTATOR" MODULE by JoomlaWorks

A simple module to offer a smart and eye-candy image rotating mechanism (slideshow in plain English)! The "AJAX Header Rotator" borrows the style from Flash rotation scripts and the brains from AJAX, which is used to dynamically load images. So you have a flash-like image rotator (or slideshow), which dynamically loads as many images as you wish, without overweighing your webpage!

It's a simple to use module, which adds to the overall look of your Joomla! website.

Check out a demo HERE and at Cinemad for a real world example!

USAGE

First of all, create a folder anywhere in your Joomla site. Prefer to do this under 'images/stories', so that you want stumble upon file permission issues! Create for example a folder named 'headers' inside 'images/stories'. Now add the full path to this newly created folder in the parameters below. The path would be 'images/stories/headers'.

Fill in below a unique ID for this image rotator (this allows to have multiple rotators at once), adjust the image delay to suit your needs and that's it! Publish the module in a position and enjoy!

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable). This allows individual module styling.

param.name: uniqueid
param.label: Unique ID for this AJAX Header Rotator
param.description: This ID is used by the module's CSS and javascript code, so keep it unique and simple, like 'rotator', using only latin characters, without any spaces or numbers!

param.name: imagefolder
param.label: Image Folder path
param.description: Set here the path to the folder containing the images to be displayed. The module will scan this folder and display images automatically!

param.name: delay
param.label: Image (header) display duration
param.description: Set here the time delay (in miliseconds) between fading images. 1000 means 1 second.
